name: Activated Charcoal Mask
ingredients: Activated Charcoal, blended with either Rhassoul Clay, Betonite Indian Healing Clay, Green clay, French Clay
key_benefits: Cleans out and tightens pores, Draws out impurity, Detoxifies and helps improve skins texture and appearance. Activated charcoal may treat moderately severe to life threatening intoxication. Activated charcoal can bind to some toxic substances and prevent them from absorbing into the body.

name: Night Oil Facial Serum
ingredients: Seabuckthorn, Bakuchoil oil, Rose hip seed oil, Carrot seed Oil
key_benefits: Antibacterial, Anti-fungal, improves appearance and evens skins’s complexion. With added natural oils for moisturising, it won’t dry out skin. Suitable for treatment of eczema, dermatitis, acne and problematic skin.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide Vit. B3 & N-Acetyl Glucosamine
key_benefits: Plumping, Hydrating, Brightens dark spots, Corrects Hyperpigmentation, Anti-wrinkle, Anti ageing, Repairs Sun damage

name: Nourishing Face Cream
ingredients: Shea butter, Licorice root,Aloe vera, Lactic acid
key_benefits: Moisturizes, Treats, Repairs, Brightens, Smoothens  and Nourishes skin. Anti oxidant rich

name: Black Soap Face Wash
key_benefits:
Antibacterial, Anti-fungal, improves appearance and evens skins'
s complexion. With added natural oils for moisturising, it won’t dry out skin. Suitable for treatment of eczema, dermatitis, acne and problematic skin.

name: Resurfacing Cleansing Lotion
ingredients: Aloe Vera, Allantoin, Argan oil and PHA
key_benefits: Removes dirt, make up and excess oil as it gently cleanses skin in preparation for next step. Soothing and won’t dry out skin. Suitable for all skin types especially dry and mature skin.
